20.eng-name: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: Ata bin As-Sa'ib reported from Sa'eed bin Abdur-Rahman bin Abza from his father:That the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to recite in witr: Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High;" and "Say: O you disbelievers!;' and 'Say: He is Allah, (the) One

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى مَالِكِ بْنِ مِغْوَلٍ فِيهِ . ب }
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the differences reported from Malik Bin Mighwal about that
